testHelp

Class FractionAssertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • testHelp.ObjectAssertion
      • testHelp.StringAssertion
        • testHelp.FractionAssertion

  • public class FractionAssertion
extends StringAssertion
    Represents an assertion related to a Fraction. It should not be in the testHelp library as fractions are not part of the basic Java language, but I added it to make it simpler for students to write FractionalCalculator tests.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FractionAssertion isEquivalentTo(int n, int d)
      Verifies that a fraction is equivalent to the specified fraction, expressed as integer numerator and denominators
      FractionAssertion isEquivalentTo(java.lang.String other)
      Verifies that a fraction is equivalent to another fraction (they reduce to the same lowest terms)

      • Methods inherited from class testHelp.StringAssertion

        doesNotMatch, equals, isEmpty, isEqualTo, isFraction, isNullOrEmpty, matches

      • Methods inherited from class testHelp.ObjectAssertion

        isEqualTo, isNotEqualTo, isNotNull, isNull, isOfType

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
